modName: R18Pn Inner Wear Set for Dream Girl
summary: This is a conversion of Kurese\'s R18Pn Inner Wear Set for the Dream Girl body replacer, with four new colors.
descriptionHtml:
Dream Girl R18Pn Inner Wear Set
Author(s): Shayaryn and Kurese

This is a conversion of Kurese\'s R18Pn Inner Wear Set, converted to fit Petrovich\'s Dream Girl body replacer, with four new colors. All of the items are available in Whiterun, next to Dragonsreach. See the included screenshot for the exact location. 

Requirements: Petrovich\'s Dream Girl body mesh, and any UNP-compatable body textures.

Credits and Permissions: Feel free to use this mod however you wish, so long as you give credit where it is due.

Thanks to Petrovich for his Dream Girl body replacer:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/41443//?

Thanks to Kurese for the original outfit:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15529//?

If you have any issues with this mod, please let me know.
author: Shayaryn and Kurese

files.name: Dream Girl R18Pn Inner Wear Set
